post:
Limited time and quantities, until 4th December 2020! 

**Deals at a glance:**

* Asia-Pacific hosted servers: Up to 23% Off for 2 years and No setup fee. 
* Special Edition servers by OVHcloud: Europe and NAM locations: recurring offers and No setup fees.
* Special Edition servers by SoYouStart: Europe and NAM locations - From only $33/month (recurring offers)
* VPS - Offer 1: 15% Off with 1-Year commitment  | Offer 2: 20% Off with 2-Year commitment | Not ready to commit?Try VPS at half price for the first month
* Public Cloud - US$200 Free Cloud Credits valid for 2 months

**View all offers, are you from?:**

*     Australia (A$): https://www.ovh.com.au/black-friday/
*     Singapore (S$): https://www.ovh.com/sg/black-friday/
*     Asia (US$): https://www.ovh.com/asia/black-friday/
*     Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovh.com/world/black-friday/

or to be redirected to your local OVH website, **visit https://www.ovh.com/black-friday/**

___________________________________________________________________________
**--> Below is a short selection of offers available in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America:**
_____

**DEDICATED SERVERS - Rise Range - Up to 23% Off**

**Perks (Included in all plans):**

* 9 locations including Australia & Singapore    
* 500Mbps bandwidth
* Anti-DDoS Protection
* 500GB Backup storage space
* No setup fees on a 1 or 2-year commitment

   
**Rise-1**

* Intel Xeon E3-1230v6 - 4 c / 8 t - 3.5 GHz / 3.9 GHz
* Up to 64GB RAM
* HDD or SSD NVMe
* Public outgoing traffic: 10TB @ 500Mbps
* Public incoming traffic: Unmetered @ 1Gbps  
* Australia or Singapore Hosted (Europe and North-America locations benefit from unmetered traffic)
* Discount applies for the commitment period chosen (12 or 24 months)
From ~~US$59.64/month~~ US$48.03/month (on a 2-year commitment)

Buy Rise-1, Are you from?

*  Australia (A$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-au/bare-metal/rise/rise-1/
*  Singapore (S$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-sg/bare-metal/rise/rise-1/
*  Asia (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/asia/bare-metal/rise/rise-1/
*  Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en/bare-metal/rise/rise-1/


**Rise-2**

* Intel i7-7700K - 4c/ 8t - 4.2GHz/ 4.5GHz
* Up to 64GB RAM
* HDD or SSD NVMe
* Public outgoing traffic: 10TB @ 500Mbps
* Public incoming traffic: Unmetered @ 1Gbps
* Australia or Singapore hosted (Europe and North-America locations benefit from unmetered traffic)
* Discount applies for the commitment period chosen (12 or 24 months)
From ~~US$72.99/month~~ US$55.32/month (on a 2-year commitment)

Buy Rise-2: Are you from?

* Australia (A$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-au/bare-metal/rise/rise-2/
* Singapore (S$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-sg/bare-metal/rise/rise-2/
* Asia (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/asia/bare-metal/rise/rise-2/
* Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en/bare-metal/rise/rise-2/

____________
**VPS - Up to 20% Off**

* Offer 1: 15% Off on 1-year commitment 
* Offer 2: 20% Off on 2-year commitment 
* Not ready to commit? Try VPS at half price for the first month

**VPS Value**

* 1 vCore
* 2GB RAM
* 40GB SSD NVMe 
* 1TB Traffic/month @ 250Mbps (Australia & Singapore locations) Bandwidth is reduced to 10Mbps once monthly quota is exceeded
* Unmetered Traffic @ 250Mbps (North America & Europe locations)
* 1 Month Automated Backup Included
* Discount applies for the commitment period chosen (12 or 24 months)
From: **US$ 4.79**/month with a 24-month commitment

Buy VPS Plans, Are you from?

* Australia (A$):  https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-au/vps/
* Singapore (S$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en-sg/vps/
* Asia (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/asia/vps/
* Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en/vps/

____________
**Public Cloud Offers - Get started with US$200 Free Cloud Credits valid for 2 months!**

* Flexible and scalable on-demand resources: compute and storage.
* Best price-performance ratio and price-storage ratio
* Available worldwide in 8 cloud regions – including Asia-Pacific, Europe and North-America
* Pay-as-you-Go: Hourly billing or monthly (50% cheaper than hourly)
* Guaranteed resources servers (RAM,CPU), 100% of the time. (harness the full power of your server at any time)
* Triple replication storage
* Public cloud Credit provided is valid for 2 months and for new customers only (full T&Cs )

Get your cloud credit, Are you from?

* Asia (US$): https://www.ovh.com/asia/lp/public-cloud-trial/
* Singapore (S$): https://www.ovh.com/sg/lp/public-cloud-trial/
* Australia/NZ (A$): https://www.ovh.com.au/lp/public-cloud-trial/
* Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovhcloud.com/en/public-cloud/
